name: Amusing Colors Child-Lock
description:
Make your child smile and buy yourself some time!
Amusing Colors is a very simple game for toddlers to play. NO ADS, NO In-App Purchases!
It's simple. Your child taps on the smilie faces to change their color.
Once they have selected all of the characters and fanfare and a cheer plays out and the colors of the screen change.
Press the bug red button to reset all of the balls and faces.
An exciting and engaging experience for your child when you need to hold their attention.

NOTE: This app is simple and locked to only one game screen so your child can not click on anything else. The home button can still be pressed to close the app.
